dct_description_sm: Shows portion of Central America and northwestern South America. Relief shown pictorially. Appears in the author's Theatrum orbis terrarum. Addidtamentum III. The two Italian editions of 1608 and 1612 are identical. cf. Burden, P.D. The mapping of North America, p. 72. Includes ill. Italian text on verso; signature 9. Originally issued on sheet with 2 other maps.
